Description: Disc from a blue glazed composition amulet in the form of a menat-counterpoise; inscribed with part of the nomen and epithets of Darius(1 or 2).
Curator's comments: To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
